monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Anti Curse
skills.description: Aura: All Debuffs are 20% less effective on Monsters in your party.

skills.name: Arcane Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery (Buff)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (120 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Breaking Spells
skills.description: Every magical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Channeled Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (400 + 40% Magic + 40% Max Mana) Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Corrosion
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break increases the Poison, Burn, Shock and Congeal damage enemies take by 20%.

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: On each hit, there's a 10% chance to trigger another hit with the same base damage. (Cannot trigger again on Double Strike hits)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Full Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (200 + 30% Magic) Shield target for 4 x (200 + 30% Defense) Removes 6 Debuffs

skills.name: Gemstone Rain
skills.description: 6 x 25% (150%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 35% (210%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Hades
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff) or Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Light Instinct
skills.description: Decrease damage taken by 15%.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Syphon
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison (Debuff) damage, each Monster in the party regenerates 5 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Mentor
skills.description: Whenever this Monster uses a single-target skill on an ally, they gain 2 random Buffs.

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overheal
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Plague
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison damage, 40% chance that the Poison spreads to another enemy.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 200% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Potion Mastery
skills.description: Aura: Potion heal effects are increased by 25%.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Quicken
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Spectral Flame
skills.description: 3 x 70% (210%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 80% (320%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 105% (420%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 105% (525%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Wave
skills.description: 1 x 180% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 240% magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spectral Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.
